extendedInfo.description: Help Cocoteenie make chocolates even Tyrant King Choco would crave for! White, Milk, Dark and Gold Chocolate!! Satisfy the people of Choco Choco village and please King Choco with scrumptious bits of sheer richness. Move around stores and shops to sell and buy products! Purchase a chocolate mixer that combines your ingredients for Choki to make exquisitely delicious chocolate bits!â» The game is saved on the device, not on the HUB. Saved data will not be recovered if you change devices or delete the game.âââ This game supports English, franÃ§ais, íê¸, ä¸­æ and æ¥æ¬èª. ââââ Chocolate Mixers for Sale!Mix and match ingredients with a tap and a touch to make your true gourmet chocolate. With 5 different chocolate mixers, try creating your own chocolate recipe!â Cute characters & Quality graphic!13 cute and comical characters! Work in the daytime, and find more excitement in the night by doing things that can only be done after the sun sets.â My very own special Chocolate!!DIY chocolate shape, decoration, syrup, and toppings!! Choose your own ingredients and design to share and trade them with other chocolatiers out there!!â Choki, the âchocolate monsterâChoki, a creature that makes chocolates when fed ingredients! Mate Chokis to get spoiled eggs and gold eggs! Once hatched, a Choki with extra powers is born to serve your customers.â Investment, the key to your business success!Invest your gold coins at a store or shop that you believe will help you. reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: The game is fun but it would have been better if coukd decorate ur own chatacter and design ur own home..
reviews.author: Jennifer Kim

reviews.title: Do not be fooled by the cuteness!
reviews.comment: The game is adorable. I love the chibi style characters and the general feel of the game. I just wish that even though the program force closed itself, the game would still be saved or maybe have an option of automatically saving data or up to the latest point you are in the game. But aside from that, good job! :)
reviews.author: Renee Jacobe

reviews.title: Very Fun
reviews.comment: Love the game, its cute, simple and lots of fun!
reviews.author: Kianana Grace

reviews.title: Very Very Good GAME!!!!
reviews.comment: I like this game, super funny easy and make me happy. Cute animation and I love chocoteenie :-) .
reviews.author: Endah Fajar Hanifa

reviews.title: Wonderful game!
reviews.comment: The interface is extremely smooth and the sounds come across great. I would love to be able to change the name and look of the character though, but this is a minor want.
reviews.author: Jace Ruono

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This is a very good game its easy to play and it is also very fun to play in your own time
reviews.author: Shreya Fakira

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Very fun..! The characters so cute.. I like this..! :D No problem i feel in this game...! ;)
reviews.author: Karina Alfiani Sulthon

reviews.title: Very adorable!
reviews.comment: Cute game, smooth gameplay! A must have for all the fans of that delicious, delicate concoction named chocolate!
reviews.author: Nina Griffin

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Very fun game no complaints completely worth them memory it uses and the 5 * rating would seriously recommended this game if you like time management and tycoon games
reviews.author: Abby Heine

reviews.title: Beware
reviews.comment: This game is too addictive!!! It will simulate your strategic brain in a very fun and cute (and sweet) way! ;) Best game I\'ve had so far! :D
reviews.author: Abbie Frans

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: So fun so amazing lots of adventure and I LOVE CHOCOLATE!!! THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!!!! I WANTED A CHOCOLATE GAME!!!!!!!!!! I WANT TO EAT CHOCOLATE NOW!!!!!! I EAT CHOCOLATE CAKE AND MY FAVORITE CHOCOLATE ICE CREAM!!!!
reviews.author: Valencia Louis

reviews.title: Kawaiii
reviews.comment: Awesome game! I love how its quicker than other games and its so cute! :)
reviews.author: Kathy Dinh

reviews.title: fun
reviews.comment: awesome, fun game. aesthetically pleasing. very addicting. surprised its free.
reviews.author: Mandy Ann

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: One of the best apps I downloaded. Really fun and adorable characters. Won\'t ever uninstall

reviews.title: So fun and kute. 5 star for it
reviews.comment: I love this game. And 5 stars 4 it. So fun, cute and worth to dl

reviews.title: Super Sweet!
reviews.comment: This is definitely the sweetest app out there. The graphics are awesome and its a lot of fun as well!

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: It is easy to play and lots of fun... also slightly addicting. The Chocto are so cute!

reviews.title: Fun, great cute graphics.
reviews.comment: I want to design my own characters. Fun game, amazing cartoons.

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Best game...super duper awesome...5star i give

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Super fun and amazing i luv games from com2us ive have been looking for fun long games like this and its free <3
